mapper.sql: uuid, user_uuid, energy_ball_uuid, in_or_out, point_change, power_change, status, time_created, time_updated
mapper.insert: insert into energy_trade_record ( uuid, user_uuid, energy_ball_uuid, in_or_out, point_change, power_change, status, time_created, time_updated ) values ( #{uuid}, #{userUuid}, #{energyBallUuid}, #{inOrOut}, #{pointChange}, #{powerChange}, #{status}, #{timeCreated}, #{timeUpdated})
mapper.select: select sum(point_change) from energy_trade_record where user_uuid=#{userUuid} and in_or_out=1 and status = 1 and time_created between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
select count(*) from energy_trade_record where user_uuid = #{userUuid};

select U.uuid as uuid, U.user_uuid as userUuid, U.point_change as point, U.time_created as time_created, U.in_or_out as in_or_out, T.source_name as source_name, T.type as type from energy_trade_record U left outer join energy_ball A on U.in_or_out = 1 and U.energy_ball_uuid = A.uuid left outer join energy_source_point T on A.point_source = T.source_code where U.user_uuid = #{userUuid} order by U.time_created desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
